description: Negative test case - secure coding patterns with no expected issues

aggregate_expectations.notes: This ground truth validates that secure coding patterns do not produce false positives. SafeCode.cs uses: parameterized SQL, SHA256/SHA512, RNGCryptoServiceProvider, AES with CBC, safe JSON serialization, HTML encoding.

SafeCode.cs.notes: Secure patterns: parameterized SQL, SHA256, RNGCryptoServiceProvider, AES-CBC, safe JsonConvert, HTML encoding
